DESCRIPTION: Scorched creatures take additional damage from #yAttacks, when attacked reduce this by #b1
Increases the Potency of all Holy Attacks and Skills.
Holy Attacks and Skills have all numeric values in their effect increased by #yZeal.
You may only have 1 Antiquity power active. Playing an Antiquity power will override other Antiquity powers you may have.
Fire cards are not effected by #yStrength or #yDexterity. Playing a fire card gives you #yHot #yStreak until you play a non-fire card.
When played add a 0 cost copy of the card without follow-up that #yPurges to you hand.
During your turn, if the last card you played was a #yFire card activate the following effect.
Increases damage and Block gain for Fire cards.
Ice cards are not effected by #yStrength or #yDexterity. Dealing damage with Ice cards applies #yChill to the target.
Chilled enemies take 1 more damage from #yIce cards per stack of chill, when a monster has 10 or more points of chill remove them and apply #yFreeze.
Increases damage and Block gain for Ice cards.
Frozen enemies take no #yIce damage and triple non-magical damage, remove this when effected receives non-magical damage.
Wind cards are not effected by #yStrength or #yDexterity. Every second wind card you play has #yTailwind reducing it's cost by 1
Every second wind card you play costs 1 less.
Increases damage and Block gain for Wind cards.
Thunder cards are not effected by #yStrength or #yDexterity. Dealing damage with Thunder cards applies #yJolt to the target.
Jolted enemies take 10% less #yThunder damage per jolted stack.
Increases damage and Block gain for Thunder cards.
Dark cards are not effected by #yStrength or #yDexterity. Playing dark cards will remove your #yAfterglow and can apply #yDarken.
Darken effects are activated when you play your next #yMagic card #yLight card excluded, playing a light card will remove any darken effects you have.
Increases damage and Block gain for Ice cards.
Light cards are not effected by #yStrength or #yDexterity. Playing light cards will remove your #yDarken and can apply #yAfterglow.
Afterglow effects are activated when you play your next #yMagic card #yDark card excluded, playing a dark card will remove any afterglow effects you have.
Arcane cards are only effected by #yArcana and #yDark #yExposure.
Enchanted cards are both #yPhysical and #yMagical. Being affected the same as a magic card of it's enchantment element as well as a physical card.
Transmuted cards have their #yElement temporarily set to the transmutation's element.
Increases damage and Block gain for Light cards.
Removed the listed number of debuffs from yourself, and perform the listed action equal to it's potency.
Increases damage and Block gain for Magic cards.
Increases damage from #yMagic for a limited time.
Loses HP when you play certain Acid cards.
When you have 10 or more Hunters Focus your next attack does triple damage and resets Hunters Focus.

When you play a spell card, reduce it's cast count by 1. When a spell's cast count is 0, it becomes #yDepleted and unplayable. When resting at rest sites you may choose 1 spell to restore all casts of..
#yUnplayable until #yCasts are restored at a rest site or at the end of the Act.
Add the listed Word in place of a Nid Word in your Shout Words.
